dataset_summary: The dataset comprises web analytics data over a period of 7 days, revealing user engagement and behavior trends on the website. Notably, the average session count is 1682.57, indicating a healthy level of engagement. The user count suggests a steady flow of returning visitors, augmented by 424.14 new users on average per day. Pageviews average at 6891.71, revealing substantial content consumption per session, with an average of 4.07 pages viewed per session. The average session duration is relatively strong at approximately 154 seconds, suggesting users are engaged with the content. However, a higher bounce rate of 16.06% points to a proportion of users leaving the site without interaction. The conversion rate stands at 4.25%, with an average of 49.43 transactions per day, translating to a revenue of 2087.17 units. These metrics provide insight into user behavior, potential areas for improvement in user retention, and revenue generation.

key_metrics.name: Average Sessions
key_metrics.description: This reflects the number of times the site was accessed by users, indicating user engagement levels.

key_metrics.name: Average Users
key_metrics.description: Represents the average daily unique visitors, showing a consistent user base.

key_metrics.name: Average New Users
key_metrics.description: Tracks the influx of new visitors, crucial for understanding growth and reach.

key_metrics.name: Average Pageviews
key_metrics.description: Shows the overall content consumption, reflecting user interest in the site's content.

key_metrics.name: Pages per Session
key_metrics.description: Indicates the depth of site exploration during a session, highlighting user engagement with content.

key_metrics.name: Average Session Duration
key_metrics.description: Represents the average time spent by users during a visit, pointing to content engagement quality.

key_metrics.name: Bounce Rate
key_metrics.description: Measures the percentage of sessions where users left without interacting, indicating possible engagement issues.

key_metrics.name: Conversion Rate
key_metrics.description: Shows the effectiveness of converting visits into transactions, crucial for revenue generation.

key_metrics.name: Average Transactions
key_metrics.description: Indicates the daily average number of transactions, reflecting sales performance.

key_metrics.name: Average Revenue
key_metrics.description: Highlights the average daily revenue generated, important for assessing the site's profitability.
